department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Gospel Stories of Wo/men
course.meeting_text: Tu., 12–2 and hour to be arranged.
course.description: This course will engage a critical feminist reading of NT texts in order to assess whether they are good news for wo/men. Special attention will be given to a feminist hermeneutics of imagination. Discussion will focus on the significance of social location, critical methods, and historical imagination for the interpretation and significance of these stories about Jewish wo/men, for contemporary religious self-understanding and ministerial praxis. Lectures, group discussions, and group projects seek to foster a participatory democratic style of learning.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1503.
